string.text: Supply man: "Varg, get back to base. Something has changed. Get further instructions."
Clear Skies Liaison: Come to the designated point. We have a lot to talk about.
Agent Freedom: "Stalker, you've been beating around the bush for a long time. Come and talk to me. I'll answer a lot of questions that interest you."
Agent Liberty: "And I warned you, but you didn't listen. Next time might not be so lucky. Come on, come back, kid... We'll teach you how life in this world works."
Clear Sky Liaison: "Move out to the designated point. Just don't do anything stupid."
Agent Liberty: Get your body over here as fast as you can. This is a very urgent matter, so there is no need to delay."
Merchant: "Varg, our fighters got one of the bastards. Let's make a quick decision with these and blow to the designated area. Get a chance to interrogate the bastard before ours strap him down."

Svoboda agent: "Well, motherfucker. This is your moment. Shooting you is too trivial. It's no fun. That's why we're opening up the hunger games. You make it back to base alive, you win. One knife will be enough for you."

Duty agent: "Well, fuck it... It's too easy to just shoot you. We need to torture you first. Let's play a game. It's called Survive the Zone with One Knife. The rules are obvious -- get to the base if you can."
Harold: "Varg, there's a job for you. One that fits your profile. Your information about Hassan checks out. This problem must be dealt with."
Karim: "Greetings. I have a case. One of the radars you installed picked up something strange. We need to find out what it is immediately."
Hassan: "Varg, I have a job for you. Fits your profile. The problem with Harold must be solved. And as quickly as possible."
Czech: "Hurry to the tower. Don't respond to your new friend Anubis' message. Otherwise you will be sorry."
Czech: "Varg, my fears have been confirmed. The Pleaners will not negotiate with you, they will simply eliminate you. Destroy them all."
Anubis: "Well hello there. I see you've made a mess of things here. Come on over, let's talk. Let's solve all the problems we've got."
